meta.title: Film & Photo Shoot Locations | NYC Film Production at Rock Center
meta.description: Rockefeller Center is one of New York's most iconic and recognizable locations. We offer film and photo locations that enhance the production of every New York story.

filmPhotoHero.title: Tell your New York story here
filmPhotoHero.caption: Location is everything. Rockefeller Center, rich in unique history and breathtaking artistry, is one of New York’s most recognizable locations, inspiring filmmakers, photographers, and artists alike to captivate audiences all over the world.

filmPhotoCalloutGrid.title: Film & Photo Locations
filmPhotoCalloutGrid.caption: If scouting in New York for a film production location, Rockefeller Center has an incredible variety of settings and architecture. From small, intimate, character-filled spaces to sweeping, grand panoramas and iconic terraces, our venues are quintessentially New York.

imageCallout.title: Partnerships
imageCallout.description: Be seen. Rockefeller Center offers a variety of marketing and branding opportunities that provide the exposure brands are looking for.

wideCta.title: Film & Photo Newsletter
wideCta.caption: Stay up-to-date on the latest film and photo oppurtunities at Rockefeller Center.
